website_summaries.verdict: Despite some issues common to men's wallets, the Mt. Eston earns our top spot for it's spaciousness, build, and design – an all-around nice wallet that meets most men's needs and style.
pros: This handsome trifold style features everything men love and need in a wallet – superior leather craftsmanship with smooth finish and 18 total pockets for cards and cash
cons: window, it's small, and cards are hard to remove once inserted
On the bulky side if you fill every slot

website_summaries.verdict: Sharp RFID-blocking all-leather wallet that can carry a large number of cards and personal items.
pros: Billfold includes a hybrid trifold/bifold design that allows you to use the item in the best way for your needs
Quality genuine leather feels soft to the touch and stands up to daily use
Includes more than a dozen card slots and many pockets
cons: Hybrid trifold/bifold design doesn't work as well when wallet is over-filled

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Well Made. Overall happy with this wallet. It is about 1 1/4" thick with all slots holding credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet with lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a wallet that is good quality with plenty of space. The slots for credit cards are wide enough to actuall hold credit cards, unlike the cheaper wallets. Would recommend this wallet highly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in N Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Good. Product Verification Left for the Repacement(Initially Bad product was delivered)
customer_reviews.text: worst product ever. Would like to give zero stars if possible. The bag tore within 2 weeks of use. Both the cardholder stitches ripped of which can be seen in the picture. Edit: I am changing the rating from 1 star to 3 stars based on their prompt reply and sending me a replacement. I have to say their after service is good and the owner takes special care to make sure we receive the product. Now I will use the Wallet for around 3-4 months and then post a review of the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: mehdi d.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tri-fold leather RFID wallet for bills and 12 cards
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful smooth leather wallet; slim to fit in front or back pockets for men but with enough slots that you can secure your cards behind RFID technology; show your driver's license without others seeing the cards you have in your wallet and enabling you to see all of your cards in this tri-fold wallet at the same time. I did a lot of comparison shopping and this was by far the best value for a genuine leather RFID wallet which holds bills as well as credit cards/pieces of identification. Great value for the price; I recommend this product highly and think it is a great gift idea. Fast service; came in gift box.
customer_reviews.author: VickyNC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wallet! My husband loves it -- he can somehow fit all his cards in this wallet and says it is more compact, so he is quite appreciative of this new wallet. Nice quality too! We are thinking of purchasing a second one to have when this one starts showing signs of wear, because he likes it that much!!
customer_reviews.author: CurtisDeb

customer_reviews.title: failed RFID scan
customer_reviews.text: FYI I placed my employee ID in this wallet, which has a RFID chip inside the card to verify if the scanner would see the card. I hate to say it did see my ID with the card inside this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got the wallet today. It is very well made and I like the style. I have 9 credit and ID cards and my drivers license plus about 12 bills in the money sections. The wallet is now 1.25 inches thick. Much thicker than the one I wanted to replace! I'll try the rubber band trick but since the cards basically stack one on top the other, plus the thickness of the leather when folded, I doubt it will get any thinner. Still a very nice well mad wallet, just don't load it with cards in all of the slots.
customer_reviews.author: MED624

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I'm really happy about this product. The third flap that is attached to the wallet has loose threads and already broke. I literally had the wallet for 2 weeks. I'm not going to ask for replacement or get a new one, as I plan on just cutting off the third flap as it continues to erode over time.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully this is a good
customer_reviews.text: It holds all of my cards that i use regularly, without being to thick. Have tried to open my office with my access card in the wallet and the scanner couldn't read the card even though it was in the plastic window of the wallet. Hopefully this is a good sign
customer_reviews.author: John Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Just a followup. After three months a bit disapointrf that fabric lining on center slots have busted.
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to be a minimalist but I’m not. I’ve tried and can still can whittle my cards to twenty. Including business cards, id, membership, credit, gift certificates and that’s the way it is. When stuffed all that crap into my new wallet I was horrified but it all fit and terribly bulky , at almost exactly that moment I received an email from the seller thanking me for my purchase and telling me to expect bulkiness and a natural breakend period of a few months. Wow talk about great customer service. I feel better and working on breaking in my wallet. I’ll re review in a few months and hope to update to five star after breakin.
customer_reviews.author: Alan  Goya

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of cards in my wallet in my previous old and stretched out wallet. I was looking for a durable and stylish replacement that can hold all of my cards & provide RFID protection. This wallet fits the bill! It has a nice finish with lots of card carrying capacity and room for money in the bill pockets. It fits comfortably in my front pocket. I was also impressed by the seller who sent me an email after I purchased the wallet. I responded with some questions and a product suggestion. He was prompt to respond, interested in my feedback, and was very polite in our correspondence.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted to contact seller for exchange. No luck.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to contact seller multiple times. Wallet has started to rip at the seam and looks to be incorrectly stitched. I just wanted a replacement but it looks like this wallet is going into the trash and I’ll get a different one. Edit: now 06/18/2020 Seller still has not contacted me. Ended up getting different wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: This wallet will break all of your cards over time so you every other month need to get new debit, credit, etc cards issued...
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: That smell!
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet if it did not have an extremely strong chemical smell. The lady in the gas station thought it was me that smelled like that. I tried to explain it was my new wallet but she just gave me a sideways look and figured it was an old man thing! After a week it does not make my eyes water now...
customer_reviews.author: C. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Even after 2 months, The ID slot is too tight and poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a RIP in less than a week, because The ID slot is too tight and made poorly. Overall the wallet is made nice and has the appropriate thickness, but not where the ID goes. That part of the wallet is held together by paper thin piece of leather and glue. I tried to pull my ID out and the ID slot is made too small and bonded poorly, so it ripped. I have a standard NYS license and it should have no problems moving in and out. Even now, having the wallet for a month the ID slot is still too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Just Not for Me.
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice enough wallet but just not for my needs. I returned it. It seems to be more suited for someone that needs less space. It has a great deal of space but when I tried to use it with my cards it barely closed.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Wing

customer_reviews.title: Very smelly
customer_reviews.text: The leather appearance is ok but the wallet has a very strong odor of chemicals. I had it in the kitchen when I first opened the package and when my wife came home she immediately asked what the smell was. I have been using it about a week now and it still smells. Looking for another wallet to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: John Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Bad tanning process.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is well designed but stinks..as in smells.. to high heaven! All I can assume is that the tanning chemicals were not flushed out. I’ve had it for weeks and the stench has not abated at all! It makes my pants smell, if I pull it out, the room smells!
customer_reviews.author: C. page

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time and money, didnt last a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: Puchaded this item back in 03/2018 and barely lasted a year and a half and i now have a wallet that is literally coming apart at the seams and for a compant that states a lifetime warrenty i see no info on how to speak with someone to have it replace. Dont waste your time or moneh
customer_reviews.author: Seth Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Ordered March 17 and it is still sitting on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered March 17 and it is still sitting on the patio. Has some type of odor, definitely not a leather smell. It is not as strong now. So hopefully in a couple of more weeks I can try it.
customer_reviews.author: rugby49

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. Checked out RFID-blocking function and it worked fine. For the dissenting reviewers, if you read the information that comes with the wallet, it states that the credit cards will fit tight when you first receive it and will be easier to maneuver the cards after a week. Also, it mentions that the shape/size of the wallet will become smaller and softer with time. I gave it a 4 star rating because I haven't had it long enough to give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I received this nicely packaged quality made wallet within the time frame promised and was quite pleased with the product. It has plenty of slots for all of my cards and I like that you can display your drivers license behind a clear panel so there is no need to remove it from the wallet when asked for identification. The leather feels top notch and is nice and smooth. I thought the cost was reasonable and have decided to purchase two more as gifts for my sons.
customer_reviews.author: JT Lenny

customer_reviews.title: TRI FOLD Mens Wallet
customer_reviews.text: inserts are not big enough for for my credit cards. Would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Faust

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, the slot that hold my Drivers license ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, the slot that holds my Drivers license is starting to fall apart and will have to be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Minn2

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I gave this wallet 3 months or so for testing before reviewing and this company wasn't lying about how great the material is! The wallet holds a lot with no problem whatsoever and the leather softens over time to be more form fitting and comfortable. I used to have those wallet/phone holder combos and the magnet was interfering with the phone compass and my watch when I stacked them together in the gym and the material was peeling within a month. I have no problem buying this company's products again.
customer_reviews.author: Ezio

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a man's wallet
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, happy to have a RFID blocking wallet, and it is big. Which is what I greatly dislike about it. Imagine you are at the cash register ready to pay, trying to get your wallet out and you can't. Not talking about ten seconds of inconvenience, this is minutes of trying and trying to get it out. You jam your hand in knowing you will probably rip the pocket simply to remove the wallet. I am a big man, over 200 pounds and my clothes are at least average size for an American man. This is ridiculous. It is a woman's purse being sold as a man's wallet.
customer_reviews.author: WSW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this wallet been! This is exactly what I have been looking for for years. It is genuinely nice and soft to the touch, fresh leather smell. I like the fact that the card slots are on the their side rather than up and down. There is more than enough slots to hold every card needed securely in place with wallet still being able to close. I am very pleased and happy with this wallet and at such an affordable price, I will be buying another for a backup!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this wallet!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was stiff for first day but softened up every day after. I have it STUFFED with more cards etc that I can possibly list here. I have 18 cards plus 3 total main IDs and my folding CDL card which protects my SS card. plus a few business cards and notes and occasional cash etc etc etc...right now it's nice and soft and measures 1 7/16" at fattest part at the fold. Actually rides well as I'm a heavy equipment operator & driver so I bounce around on it for about 13 hrs straight every day. Best product EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: phil chirico

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says it will.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wallet for about two weeks and am still waiting for it to "thin out". The foot print is the same as my previous wallet, but it's like have a brick in my back pocket. I will keep it a few more weeks and see if it does get thinner. if not I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY is # 1 Perfect Tri-Fold Wallet
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY is # 1 Perfect Tri-Fold Wallet! My husband prefers a Tri-Fold and this one is perfect, The Leather is a great quality, smells so good too! the interior is roomy and he is able to insert all credit cards, ID'S, notes, money, receipts that he carries, everything has a spot and it is nice to be able to keep everything so well organized. The design, quality, of this wallet is perfect and the added bonus of RFID protection is wonderful. This website has a very large assortment of both men's and ladies wallets, several designs, I know you will find and be both happy and satisfied with your choices. Please check them out!
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMomX4

customer_reviews.title: A little bit big, but great product overall.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Lots of card and bill space. Fits 11 credit "card style cards" and 1 ID. Two full pockets for bills and small pockets behind the CC holders for things like biz/insurance cards -Seems to have high quality seams and leather crafting -Nice and soft -Credit card slots are nice and snug Cons: -A little bit taller and wider than I expected. It's almost half an inch larger in every dimension than my last wallet, but it still fits in my pocket just fine, but is certainly bulkier. -Leather reeks for the first week or so. Just let it air out.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mildew smell/amended review
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet.... but was mildewed. The smell was so awful that I returned it. This is an amended review. My initial review was 1 star because of the smell and we returned it. The seller contacted me, apologized and offered a free replacement. They have excellent customer service. Why 4 stars? The seller implied what I smelled on the initial wallet was "leathery smell" .... nope nope nope. New wallet was display model and no smell, nice wallet, and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, very nice billfold.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase !! Quality is top-notch; leather seems to be of a high grade. For years, carried a money clip as well as a RFID secure pocket secretary for my credit cards. This billfold addressed all of my needs, perfect for me ! As others have stated, there is a "break in" period (about two weeks) for the leather to soften. Took a little "getting use to" during that time, but now works well even when I carry it in my front pocket. Very happy with the end results. Also, the packaging was secure and the billfold was protected in it's own box. Quality product, arrived as scheduled, is as advertised, a very nice billfold !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sure smells nice...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it for three weeks now. I'm not a big fan. Pluses: plenty of credit card pockets, two money pockets, the RFID material, and the quality are great. Cons: the overall bulk of the thing and the wasted space overall. My previous trifold wallet was tight enough that for even when full, it was compact. This one by contrast seems to consume a heck of a lot more space despite holding the same exact contents. Its layout encourages the insertion side to spread quite a bit, which I anticipate could be a problem down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Chinook_Mech74

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ORGANIZER WALLET
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS STURDY FLEXIBLE LEATHER--ENOUGH POCKETS FOR ALL PLASTIC CREDIT CARDS--ADDED A PLASTIC WALLET INSERT FOR PAPER CARDS SUCH AS SOCIAL SECURITY,INSURANCE,ETC FOR BETTER PROTECTION (AS OTHERWISE NOT ENOUGH POCKETS) PLACED IN PLASTIC WALLET INSERT (PURCHASED SEPERATELY) UNDER MID SECTION OF THE TRI-FOLD--MUCH MORE ORGANIZED THAN MY PREVIOUS WALLET--ALSO WILL FIT WIDER EURO BILLS--ALSO USE REAR COMPARTMENT BEHIND THE DOLLAR COMPARTMENT FOR COUPONS AND REWARD CARDS--BETTER THAN A LADY'S POCKET BOOK--USED A MARKER PEN TO LABEL VISIBLE PART OF CREDT CARDS IN THEIR POCKETS FOR EASY IDENTIFICATION AS HELPFUL FOR LESS FREQUENTLY USED CREDIT CARDS
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, high quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality wallet. The leather feels (and smells) great. By the very nature of the design the it does get a little fat with a lot of cards in it, but it does have a high capacity so you have to expect that. Really like the look of it, and I'm really hopeful that it can stand up to the beating it's about to take in my possession. Happily support this small, family business. Spend the extra $$$ and be satisfied right out of the gate.
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed as there is no Zip to protect higher notes ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as there is no Zip to protect higher notes or keep something important without falling out. Inside it not leather. Let's see how it goes with time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sivakumar

customer_reviews.title: ...the best wallet I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally well-made wallet with room for just about everything I need to carry. As mentioned in the product description, it was very stiff at first, but I stuffed every card I had into it to stretch and soften it and even carried it around the house so it would break in more quickly, and it is just fine now. I am impressed with the detail of the stitching and the quality of the materials. This is easily the best wallet I've ever owned. An added plus was the meticulous, gift-quality packaging. I can't praise enough the care that went into every aspect of this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael JJJ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: The wallet itself is what I was looking for, but it smells so bad people around me can smell it. It smells like it has been in a musty basement for a long time. I have put in rice and baking soda to try to get rid of the smell, but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adamson

customer_reviews.title: beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Who knows what time will bring, but for now, this is a fabulous wallet. It seems very well made and I love the fact it has so many slots for cards. I especially like the flip out feature. No, I don't have that many credit cards, but it seems everyone has a loyalty card or membership card these days. I had a Levi's wallet that had a lot of pockets, It didn't fall apart, but the edges got frayed and I was afraid it would fall apart so I bought this. The Levi's wallet was much thinner leather, so I have high hopes this wallet will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michiganman

customer_reviews.title: BEST WALLET, EVER......
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wallet, best I've ever owned. It is big enough to allow you to stuff cash inside without dog tagging or crinkling the bills and there is a divider to allow segregating the smaller bills from the larger, to save rummaging around when you're at the checkout counter. The trifold feature is what allows so many slots for credit cards and even some hidden pockets. My favorite part is the wonderful leather smell: I keep it in the box it came in to help preserve this aroma...
customer_reviews.author: Metal bender

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice large wallet with plenty of space to hold cards. It also seems to be built solidly. I didn't have any problem with slots being too tight for my cards. In fact, I was able to put 2 cards in a few slots right away. When I first filled it it was quite thick and didn't close properly, but--as the included instructions stated--giving it a few days to wear in and stretch has worked well. The wallet does have a light odor of leather but that is to be expected from a *leather* wallet. Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase so far and expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, RFID blocking tech is slightly exaggerated.
customer_reviews.text: I think that if this wallet were billed (no pun intended) as an RFID interferer, it might be more accurate. I can still buzz into my building with it closed and my chip in the middle of the wallet. For some other things, prolonged contact will also still work. About a third of the time, it blocks the full signals. Thats the only reason it loses a star here. But the wallet as a wallet is fantastic. It really feels like a good quality product. I will update my review in a year if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: James Locke

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: The good: Five stars for design. This wallet has plenty of pockets for cards, which is great. It also has protection from scammers built in. The bad: One star for the chemical stench. While this company claims to be American and to buy only the best leather from around the world, these wallets are made in China and come with an almost unbearable odor, which is showing little sign of abating after nearly a week. Hopefully this will go away with time and before I am ostracized from public gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon1

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved wallet
customer_reviews.text: According to my husband, this is absolutely one the best wallets he has had. He had an old faithful wallet for over 10 years that needed to be replaced. I had recently bought another trifold wallet for him, but he claimed that it was bulky and would open in his poket. Came across this wallet and was a little skeptical of getting another wallet. The reviews convinced me to get this wallet and immediately noticed the nice packaging and high quality leather. It has a lot of slots to place credit/ID cards. It lays flat with everything in it. My husband is very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Starbucksuser

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the wallet yesterday, so this is based on first impressions. The wallet appears to be well made and nicely stitched. Keep in mind the 18 pocket includes the two bill pockets, so you're left with 16 card slots including the window slot for picture ID. The card slots are a bit tight, but that is the case with any new wallet. After the break-in period, I am certain they will soften and the cards will be easier to remove. The wallet is also a rich black color, which I like. I'll post an updated review after I've been using the wallet for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nearly 70 Years Old
customer_reviews.text: Nearly 70 Years old and I like it better than any other wallet I've ever owned. You know when you buy a new wallet and you put all your stuff in it and never fits right? Or you wish you could keep your old wallet but it's falling apart so you keep it in the drawer just in case. Not this ..... I've never seen so many slots for cards, ever. High quality, leather is soft, feels great. Flexible, (takes a little time to conform) everything fits, pockets and slots galore .... oh it's perfect !!!! Wow !!!! (Made to hold US dollar bills.)
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts ....

customer_reviews.title: Wallet is well made
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is less bulky than some I have had. The stitching is well centered to prevent the leather from coming apart. Most important of all credit cards and drivers license fit nicely. Some earlier reviewers complained of a strong odor or leather smell... I have had no problem with this. I have been using this wallet for 2 weeks and it is already mostly broken in. I would definitely buy another and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Slots
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well it will hold up but love all the card slots. That alone made it worth buying. It's not a thick leather but it seems well made. My husband likes that it has a paper money divider. One section of the card slots are wide enough to accommodate his laminated Medicare card. That's a first as most slots in wallets are only large enough to hold plastic credit cards. It has a nice clear plastic fronted enclosed slot for a driver's license and removal is fairly easy. Overall we are pleased with the function, quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built, attractive wallet. My problem is the folded size. It is a tri fold wallet which means there are three separate sides. I like the wallet but it doesn't work for me. I'm keeping the wallet because I've used it. I recently bought a money-clip style wallet.
customer_reviews.author: RKinBedford

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and functional wallet
customer_reviews.text: I will keep this short and sweet. This wallet is flat out terrific. It has the new RFID blocking tech. so unscrupulous people with scanners cant walk by your table and cyber hack you. The wallet has a place for a photo ID, it folds out neatly as a trifold and holds easily 11 cards, not counting hidden pouches or double stacking. Need a new wallet? Great, this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan480

customer_reviews.title: Comparable good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a Levi's wallet that was very similar and was good quality. Thought I'd try this one and it is as good, maybe better than the Levi's. I like the layout of the Mt. Everest a little better and, I like that the ID pocket is clear plastic instead of the mesh in the Levi. But, like I said, both are very good quality. The only 5 star rating from me would be if I took my own design to a leather shop and had one custom made.
customer_reviews.author: GGFWindsor

customer_reviews.title: nice looking wallet with a poor design
customer_reviews.text: this wallet has alot of features, but the way it is stamped and has its logo engraved into the wallet makes it so that the wallet has very uneven areas. Some areas is loose and towards the innerwallet it is very tight and still has not broken in after months of use. You literally cannot put a couple of cash bills that will be straight it will bend and crimple. Ive had chinese wallets that are 5-10$ that perform alot better.
customer_reviews.author: Thang

customer_reviews.title: An excellent billfold that holds all my cards and my money
customer_reviews.text: An excellent billfold that holds all my cards and my money. It also has innner pockets to hold other things I have like pictures. This billfold costs more than other billfolds, but this one is made from actual leather and constructed with excellent care. It has one see through window for my drivers license. This billfold protects my credit cards from being scanned which I really like. I recommend very highly getting this billfold that will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: James H Kilburn

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Bell, While the overall look and construction of the wallet was okay. I found it to be smaller than I expected. My biggest issue with was it's terrible smell, which I could not deal with. Sorry. C.U.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin S Uretsky

customer_reviews.title: Everest RFID Trifold had the same features I liked in the old one and also had the RFID ...
customer_reviews.text: My old wallet was beginning to show its age. I wanted another wallet of high quality and same features to replace it. The Mt. Everest RFID Trifold had the same features I liked in the old one and also had the RFID blocking feature which is an important new feature I wanted. Its quality appears to be at the highest level and I expect it to last me another 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: J  Edward Smith

customer_reviews.title: It has an excellent capacity to hold all the credit cards
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made mens trifold wallet made with high quality materials. It has an excellent capacity to hold all the credit cards, various id cards for medical and social organizations, etc., and folding cash, yet remains thin enough not to bulge your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Elwyn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet for my husband after he could not find a wallet he liked in the few department stores we have in our area. I thought he would reject it as he seemed to be so particular while shopping. To my delight, he loved it. It had the right number of spaces for cards, two compartments for paper money and a separate windowed pocket for his driver's license. It is a slight bit larger than his previous wallet but fit in the pockets of his pants. He has only been using it for a week, but no complaints about it. I ordered a second one for my son for Father's Day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet for my husband, as his was literally falling apart. It came in well-packaged, and the leather seems to have even been lightly oiled. It was well received and my husband loves it. It's a tri-told, with a clear space for a license and tons of room for credit/debit/business cards. It's larger than I anticipated but fits easily into his pocket, and lays flat due to its larger surface area. Overall a great product for a great price. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Have just started using it, so it's a bit early to know for sure. But, I like the feel of it in my pocket and love the smell of the genuine leather. The tri-fold flip is great for extra credit card storage and it like the fact the currency holder has two pockets. I wish it were a little bit wider as I sometimes stick a business card in the currency section and with this wallet, the cards stick out. Great customer service from Mt. Easton. I received an email immediately after ordering it giving me a contact should I have any issues with the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Roland E. Breunig

customer_reviews.title: bifold fits in pocket, trifold flip-out holds more cards
customer_reviews.text: This nice looking leather wallet has places for bills, ID card, 11 card slots, and 3 places under the card slots to tuck another card, money, or note. I've carried a similar wallet in my pants pocket for years, but it has started to show wear so I've been searching for a replacement. This is the only one I could find on Amazon or any other website. The bifold fits in the pocket, and the trifold flip-out gives easy access to cards without making the whole thing too fat.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Before I even opened the box the wallet came in (very nice box BTW), a strong smell of leather hit me. There is something very primal and rustic about that smell. I've had the wallet for a week now and I am extremely happy with it. It is exactly as pictured / described, perhaps even better, and who can argue with the price! Even including the postage, a wallet of this quality would easily be double the price in my country. Randomly found this when looking for a new wallet and couldn't be happier. You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: James Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Functional... But Strong Smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good wallet. Functional and durable, with plenty of space. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 Stars is how strong the treated leather smell was when it first arrived. It took MONTHS for that smell to not be very noticeable every time I took the wallet out from my back pocket to use it. Many months. Now that the smell is not noticeable, I absolutely love it. So if you can hang with it and wait for the smell to dissipate over time, you'll have yourself a great wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE, BLACK, WELL MADE BILLFOLD.  .  Holds a lot of cards, securely and safely with  RFID
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many billfolds before I chose this one. It was for a special friend on his birthday, so I wanted a really nice one that served his needs. He was pleased with it; instantly sitting down and started filling it. It held ALL his cards, so that was a plus. And the security of the RFID makes it a super gift. . I'm sure it will last a long time, unlike his old cheaper one that literally fell apart after a year. Thanks for an EXCELLENT product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this wallet to my husband as a gift. I was worried because it was larger than his previous tri-fold but he really likes it a lot. The wallet is slimmer and less bulky than his other wallet. He's only been using it one week but it seems to be well made with a good quality, smooth leather. I saw comments about the odor but the only reason it would be a problem is if you don't like the smell of genuine leather. So far, it's been an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a RFID blocking wallet and tried this based on reviews and features. I love it. The slots for credit cards are uniform and hold cards securely. The divided area for bills is convenient. Workmanship is of high quality. They tell you that wallet will soften and lose the new leather smell in about a week. Mine did not take that long. I do not use all the slots, so it might be bulkier with 18 cards, but I find this no bigger than my previous one with a designer name an cost at least twice as much. This is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: rockerralph

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a better wallet with RFID protection. I believe I have found it. This wallet holds a lot and though I haven't tested the RFID blocking, I'm sure I won't be disappointed. As others have pointed out, it seems bulky (at first) and cards are difficult to insert or remove. Give it time people. The longer I've used the wallet, the less bulky it has become and the cards are becoming easier to manipulate as well. This is real leather (smells great) and as such will stretch some over time...exactly the way it was designed, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wallets I have ever had. I've had it for a little over a month and definitely would recommend it and would buy again if I ever need another one again. I was looking for a bigger wallet but not so big that it wouldn't fit in my pocket comfortably and this wallet fit the bill. I like the way that after just a few weeks it stretched out just enough that everything slides out easily but doesn't fall out. The RFID blocking covers my credit cards completely but they are easy to pull out when needed. Keep up the good work Mt. Eston.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Rosencrants

customer_reviews.title: I think this wallet looks great. And yes it is very full when i ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this wallet looks great. And yes it is very full when i have everything in it , but its already getting smaller. My one complaint is that it stinks when you first get it.......and the smell is so bad that it comes right thru my pants.....was very strong for two or three days but has subsided....Now I can breath easier. Just hope it wasn't a formaldehyde smell or bad chemical smell..
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. GreifingerTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and has a lot of storage area
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say to use the wallet and the stiffness will work out to a normal shape. It's true. The wallet softens with use and doesn't fall apart as other wallets have. This feature is especially useful if you have to carry a lot of credit and ID cards. I don't know how effective the RFID blocking functions are; so I guess you need a lab too do that.
customer_reviews.author: A155MM

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered on time and in excellent shape. No longer do I have to worry ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had problem in the past loosing things out of my wallet. It was delivered on time and in excellent shape. No longer do I have to worry about loosing things and it’s large enough that it fits comfortable in my back pocket. I highly recommend this wallet to anyone. Looks really nice and built strong. I would recommend this wallet to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet...honest
customer_reviews.text: Okay, just got deliver On this wallet. I bought primary based on previous reviews. My initial reaction....wow, what a great looking and feeling wallet. I was worried that the cards may be difficult to insert because new wallets are always a struggle, but no...it was easy. So we’ll constructed my belief is this wallet will give me great service for years. The leather is QUALITY, not that cheap feeling cowhide. The feel is luxury. This should s the wallet we have been looking for. If in doubt, order it...guarantee you won’t send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Longhorn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When every space is filled in that wallet, it becomes a little bulky partially because its material (leather) is too thick. On the other hand, high quality of leather, precise workmanship, and durability makes this wallet a perfect find for anyone who's not looking for excessive capacity. Mt. Eston's seem to be a user friendly company with a responsive Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very well made wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. He wanted an RFID blocking wallet. This one had good reviews. We were not disappointed. It i comes wrapped very securely. It has a good "feel" to it. It is well made. It held all his cards. He said he liked it. It would make a nice gift for any man in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new wallet and am partial to this particular style. It fits great in my front pockets and has more card slots than the one I was replacing. I bought an insert for pictures that I slid into the top slot behind the ID slot. Cards fit snug at first but within a couple days of use, the wallet has relaxed and this is now my new favorite wallet!
customer_reviews.author: augben

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet, Too large for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made wallet. I purchased it to replace a far smaller wallet. This is actually a quite large wallet. I carry my wallet in the front pocket of my trousers and I found it too thick. This wallet has more slits than I need. I would check if you need a wallet this large. Amazon has very convenient return. I simply asked for a return code and then took the code and wallet to UPS and received a refund. So there really is no risk in buying wallet online.
customer_reviews.author: sweater lover

customer_reviews.title: A safe RFID wallet..well made...good quality...
customer_reviews.text: In the world of security fears, hacking, credit card scams, etc...we all need to be more alert and safe with our identity and credit cards. I bought this wallet for that very reason and I have been very impressed with the size and quality of the product itself. Having an RFID wallet makes perfect sense in this day and age. The price is good, the quality of the product appears to be excellent (I have had the wallet for a few weeks now) and I will most likely buy a second one to eventually replace this one after this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wallet for a guy like me
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find a wallet with enough slots for ALL your cards, and fits in your pocket at the same time, but this Mt. Everest does exactly that and looks (and smells) great at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Molodetz

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, fine leather, very functional wallet. Can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I don't like tri-fold wallets. But, this one is pretty nice. The cards slots are all sized to fit right. The paper money section comes with a divider to keep dollars separate from receipts or business cards. Been using it for a few weeks now and very happy with it. Lots of card slots for licenses, credit cards, health / drug cards, and punch cards for my frequented restaurants/stores. I've had other wallets but, none with the capacity and feel of this one. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: ITomFlying

customer_reviews.title: New wallet
customer_reviews.text: Just as hard to pick out a new wallet for hubby, as a purse for Mom. He Loves all the separate storage for credit, bank and med cards. Hopefully keep him from misplacing things, at least in his wallet. Was glad to see the license holder is ATTACHED! As others said, once filled it's a little bulky, but less than a week it's conforming to his pocket and hind end!! Well made, expect it too last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: Great size holds lots of cards
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet but I only had it for a short time and the liner is already ripping out and I only have 1 card in each slot I thing it wasn’t sawed in right would give it 5 stars if it stayed together After hearing from Richard Bell with Mt. Everett, I have chosen to edit my review to say they have gone above and beyond to ensure my complete satisfaction with this product! I will be ordering from them again the next time I need a new wallet or when I want to purchase one for a gift. Great company to work with and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Well deserved rating.
customer_reviews.text: I can see why this wallet is rated so high. It's great. Plenty of room for credit cards, and your cash goes in the bi-fold section which, if you have to insert money in a bill acceptor, a tri-fold wallet makes the money curl in such a way that it's hard to insert the bills into the bill acceptor. A bi-fold doesn't cause this problem. I might buy another one and stash it in my dresser drawer for the day this one eventually wears out
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Mt. Everest; My country
customer_reviews.text: ​I bought this wallet because I found its logo very interesting. I am not sure to whether it is made out of the leather, but it feels super good and is got really good styles, and it is small and thin and and perfect for my any pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jiban Gurung

customer_reviews.title: a pleasure to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased another RFID trifold wallet. The wallet was stiff and difficult to use so I was unsure about purchasing another. However, the Mt. Everest wallet is wonderful. The generous pockets make it easy to keep and retrieve all the cards that are apart of our daily lives. The leather is beautiful and the number of pockets simplify retrieving cards or money when necessary. I am enjoying using this wallet. It feels good in hand and in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: liteq

customer_reviews.title: After a while, cards have cracked after being in the wallet for some time.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wallet. My hubby is really pleased with it. UPDATE: Almost one year later, hubby just had to order a new wallet. About six months ago we started noticing warped cards. I was under the impression that the wallet would give, but instead, it’s warping cards to the point they are cracking. So disappointed, because he used to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadna Somers

customer_reviews.title: This wallet has plenty of card slots
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality and stitching around the edges of the wallet. I was impressed with the number of card slots. I also like the double money divider for paper money, this helps keep personal money separate from household money or receipts from money. I would have liked color options like brown but black is acceptable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mwp1971

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase: it is what it says
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always preferred traditional trifolds but I thought I’d give this a try. It’s a hybrid of sorts. Soft leather. Slots for cards not to tight not to loose and there are plenty of them. Has the divider in the bill slot which he really wanted. He is very pleased and it is far less bulky than his trifold. Price is reasonable. Good service. Good company and very pleased with product.The color is black.
customer_reviews.author: Fair

customer_reviews.title: the best I could find.
customer_reviews.text: It's a similar design of the one I have had for 10 years but without a clear plastic removable insert to keep SSI card, fishing license and other delicate I.D's. (hence only 4 stars). It appears to be of high quality and the credit cards fit snugly and are less likely to fall out when the wallet is opened. I was looking at first at stores like Macy's and Kohl's and nobody of them had this type of trifold wallet and what they had was overpriced and unsuitable for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: gms

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected! Holds all my cards and stays slim enough to be comfortable in my back pocket. I keep my ID badge in my wallet and it doesn't open the security doors unless I take it out. Makes me feel more secure about my credit cards. I highly recommend this wallet. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: :Love the extra credit card slots
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wallet if you need extra slots for cards. I bought this for my boyfriend who specifically wanted more slots for cards, etc. RFID blocking is an added plus. He is still breaking it in..so hopefully it will thin out more with wear. The only negative is I wish the leather was better quality. It looks a little cheap but for extra capacity there isn't a ton of options out there. Otherwise, I would have spent more money on a better quality leather. Seems pretty durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is a Bifold wallet, not trifold, but still solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a bifold wallet, not a trifold wallet. Yes, there is an extra slot that folds out when you open the bifold wallet up, but that does NOT make it a trifold. THAT BEING SAID, the wallet itself seems to be solid, and I have corresponded with the company, and they are a very fair company. While I was looking for a classical trifold wallet, I would still recommend doing business with this company, and I would likely do business with them in the future
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone who carries the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect. It has more room for cards than I have ever found in any other wallet. After using it for about two weeks the bulkiness is beginning to disappear. I find it easy to access my cards and yet I don’t feel any danger that they might fall out. I highly recommend this wallet for anyone with a large number of cards to carry.
customer_reviews.author: John McC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wallet that holds lots of cards so this is great. I engaged in a long overdue Spring cleaning of my wallet and what is left over fits nicely. I put my wallet in my front pocket so I no longer feel like I have a brick there. It is wider but noticeably slimmer.I have been able to slide cards in and out with little trouble. The leather appears to be of good quality. There is a strong smell of tanning chemicals initially but that will dissipate. RFID is a bonus. Altogether I am happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Art3rd

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet.. My last wallet was still serviceable, but I'd done some sewing to keep it from falling apart. Decided to let the old girl go off to the great wallet resting ground in the sky. This wallet seems to be very well made. It's got more spaces for credit cards, etc than I'll ever need. I've only had it a few weeks so its still kinda stiff, but it's starting to conform to my back pocket. Sure it will be like an old friend soon.
customer_reviews.author: RockinRicky

customer_reviews.title: It everything it is advertised to be
customer_reviews.text: Buying a wallet sight unseen except for pictures is a very tricky experience so I opened the package with considerable concern. However, what I discovered was every thing the seller had advertised, which purchase permitted me to eliminate three other personal item carriers. The wallet was all it was advertised to be, and id recommend same for anyone who like me, has too many need for slots to hold their data
customer_reviews.author: don davidson

customer_reviews.title: I love the large number of pockets for credit cards keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet seems incredibly well made. It is a bit thicker and heavier than I expected, which as it turns out is really not a problem. I love the large number of pockets for credit cards keeping them all at my fingertips and easily accessible. I also love the flip out ID page offering even more pockets and pouches and making the ID easily accessible at all times. Great wallet!
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: A superior wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, perfect size for me, very nice leather and appears well made, very nice deep black color. Was well packaged and was exactly what I was looking for in a replacement wallet. The price for the quality was also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: HAB

customer_reviews.title: The Co that makes the wallet keeps in touch and is there to help you.
customer_reviews.text: What did I like the most about this wallet, well just everything! U can’t imagine how soft the leather is, along with having the now popular RFID blocking it truly is up to date. It even has extra large capacity for card holders for the man that has to carry everything with his name on it. I can’t say enough good things about this product and follow up from the Co.to insure customer satisfaction! The only negative I can possibly think of is that on the web site the color of the wallet appears gold and it took me some reading before I found out the wallet was black!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and well designed.  RGID blocking is a plus
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is larger than my previous wallet but well constructed. I have had it for a week and as they advised it is starting to compress and become flatter over time and the edges rounding in. My previous wallet was a bi-fold and this is a tri-fold so it will never be as flat. The reason I replaced the previous wallet was that some of the credit card pockets had become so loose that depending on which way I held the wallet in transit to and from my pocket there was a danger a card could fall out. The pockets are deeper on this wallet and the tri-fold design makes that less likely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product hands down
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the leather is top notch as well as the stitching and sizing of the individual compartments. The only thing I do not care about it is the overall thickness of the wallet as a whole. In all fairness I have never had a tri-fold wallet and was not sure of what to expect. I will continue to use this specific wallet to see if I get used to it. I will say though, if I decide to get another wallet it will definitely be a Mt. Everest product, I will just look for a bi-fold one. Excellent product hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Caccia

product_meta.title: Mt. Eston RFID Blocking Trifold Bifold Mens Wallet, 18 Pocket Extra Capacity
product_meta.description:
*** Perfect Gift! Get it at Today's Price! ***

RFID Blocking Security - Get security and assurance with our independently tested RFID Blocking technology which prevents electronic thieves from scanning your credit/debit card information by walking near you. Our military grade RFID shielding technology is tested and approved at 10 MHz to 3000 MHz, including the 13.57 MHz that RFID credit cards use.

Trifold Bifold Extra Capacity Design - Our wallets contain a total of 18 pockets: 11 individual card slots, 4 oversize pockets for multiple items, 2 currency bill layers, and 1 ID Card window.

Sealed Gift Box - Mt. Eston Wallets are the perfect present, arriving factory sealed in a stylish gift box and gift-ready. They will be impressed with the smell/feel of the wallet upon unwrapping.

High-End Quality and Value - Made with the Finest, Smoothest, Softest Napa Pebble Grain 100% Leather (Black) and Premium Finish, our U.S.-based family business expertly sources the leather. Wallets are hand-stitched at our supervised international factory, then individually inspected in the U.S. for a durable build, producing a quality/affordable product.

Lifetime Warranty - Purchases from "Mt. Everest Products, Fulfilled by Amazon" qualify for our warranty. Mt. Eston is under USPTO trademark and purchases from unauthorized sellers will not qualify.


Summary
* RFID Blocking Security, Military Grade Shielding Technology
* Trifold Bifold Extra Capacity Design
* 18 Total Pockets
* 11 Card Slots
* 4 Over-Size Pockets
* 2 Bill Layers
* 1 ID Window
* Perfect Christmas, Birthday Gift
* Sealed Gift Box
* 100% High-End Leather (Black) with a Premium Finish


Manufacturer's Note
New wallets start bulky and card slots tight, but stretches out after a few weeks for a better fold-over, reducing thickness, and slide cards in/out well.
feature_bullets: RFID Blocking Security - Mt. Eston Wallets give security and assurance with our independently tested RFID Blocking technology. RFID Blocking prevents electronic thieves from using a scanner and stealing your credit and debit card information simply by walking near you. Our military grade RFID shielding technology is tested and approved at 10 MHz to 3000 MHz, including the 13.57 MHz that RFID credit cards use. Protect yourself with an RFID Blocking Wallet.

Trifold Bifold Extra Capacity Design – The wallet has 18 total pockets: 11 individual card slots, 4 extra capacity oversize pockets for more items, 2 full-size bill layers, and 1 ID Card window. The Trifold Bifold design compacts as a bifold or flips out as a trifold with a 4-4-3 open layout to access all your cards at once. ***New wallets starts bulky and card slots tight, but stretches out after a few weeks, folding better, reducing thickness, sliding cards in/out well***

Sealed Gift Box – Mt. Eston Wallets are the perfect present on his Birthday, Anniversary, Graduation, Wedding, Christmas, Valentine's Day or Father’s Day. Wallets are factory sealed in a stylish gift box, so you can easily gift it to that special someone on that special day. Our professionals take great care to wrap each wallet in special packaging so anyone will be impressed with the smell and feel of the wallet unwrapping it for the first time.

High-End Quality and Value – Wallets are produced with the Finest, Smoothest, Softest Napa Pebble Grain 100 percentage Leather (Black) that we add a Premium Finish. Our U.S.-based family business are experts in sourcing the best leather, wallets are then hand-stitched at our supervised international factory, and then individually inspected at our U.S. facilities to ensure a durable, high quality build. Our unique process ensures the best quality, affordable product on the market.

Lifetime Warranty and 100 percentage Money Back Guarantee: To quality for our Lifetime Warranty, 100 percentage Money Back Guarantee, you must purchase from Mt. Everest Products. It will say "Sold by Mt. Everest Products and Fulfilled by Amazon". Mt. Eston is under USPTO trademark, purchases from any other unauthorized sellers under this listing will not qualify.
Special Size Type - Big Boys, Weave Type - Woven
